metadata.title: CVE-2020-1944 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: There is a vulnerability in Apache Traffic Server 6.0.0 to 6.2.3, 7.0.0 to7.1.8, and 8.0.0 to 8.0.5 with a smuggling attack and Transfer-Encoding andContent length headers. Upgrade to versions 7.1.9 and 8.0.6 or laterversions.

criterions.comment: trafficserver: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
